attributes.action: Business Rate Relief to be extended to all small businesses in healthcare.
attributes.additional_details: To extend the business rate relief to all dental practices and medical and aesthetics clinics and any small business that’s in healthcare
attributes.background: To extend the business rate relief to all dental practices and medical and aesthetics clinics and any small business that’s in healthcare
